api_list.name: Generate name
api_list.description: Takes ?race=race (default == elf) || ?gender=gender (default == male) to generate race specific male/female name

api_list.name: Get available races
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ultimate-name-generator.p.rapidapi.com/available-races"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ultimate-name-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ultimate-name-generator.p.rapidapi.com/available-races"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ultimate-name-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
